characters.description: The narrator of the story, Nick is a young man from the Midwest who moves to West Egg to learn the bond business. He is tolerant and non-judgmental, which makes him a confidant to many, but he also feels disillusioned by the superficiality and moral decay of the wealthy East Coast society.
characters.description_ko: 이야기의 화자인 닉은 채권 사업을 배우기 위해 중서부에서 웨스트 에그로 이주한 젊은이이다. 그는 관대하고 비판적이지 않아서 많은 사람들의 confidant가 되지만, 부유한 동부 해안 사회의 피상성과 도덕적 부패에 환멸을 느낀다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Gatsby in his mid-thirties, standing on his mansion's lawn at night, gazing wistfully towards a distant green light. He wears a cream-colored suit, a pink shirt, and a gold tie, reflecting his nouveau riche status. His expression is a mix of hope and longing, with a hint of sadness in his eyes. The background features his opulent mansion, softly lit, with a sense of mystery and grandeur. Style: Painterly, with rich colors and dramatic lighting.
characters.description: Gatsby is a mysterious and wealthy man who lives in a lavish mansion in West Egg. He is known for throwing extravagant parties, but his true desire is to recapture a lost love from his past.
characters.description_ko: 개츠비는 웨스트 에그의 호화로운 저택에 사는 신비롭고 부유한 남자이다. 그는 사치스러운 파티를 여는 것으로 유명하지만, 그의 진정한 욕망은 과거의 잃어버린 사랑을 되찾는 것이다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Tom Buchanan, a sturdy, straw-haired man in his early thirties, with a hard mouth and arrogant eyes. He is dressed in riding clothes, emphasizing his wealth and privileged background. His posture is aggressive, leaning forward, suggesting his domineering personality. The background features a lavish Georgian Colonial mansion, symbolizing his established wealth and status. Style: Realistic, with sharp lines and a focus on physical details.
characters.description: Tom is a wealthy and arrogant man, married to Daisy Buchanan. He is physically imposing and openly displays his dominance, embodying the careless and destructive nature of the established elite.
characters.description_ko: 톰은 부유하고 오만한 남자이며, 데이지 뷰캐넌과 결혼했다. 그는 육체적으로 훤칠하고 노골적으로 자신의 우월함을 드러내며, 기득권층의 부주의하고 파괴적인 본성을 구현한다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Daisy Buchanan, a beautiful woman with a sad and lovely face, framed by bright eyes and a passionate mouth. She wears a white dress, symbolizing her fragile innocence, and is adorned with pearls. Her expression is a mixture of longing and despair, reflecting her inner turmoil. The background features a lavish interior with French windows, suggesting her confinement within her opulent lifestyle. Style: Impressionistic, with soft, dreamy colors and a focus on emotional expression.
characters.description: Daisy is Nick's cousin and Tom's wife, known for her enchanting voice and captivating charm. She is torn between her love for Gatsby and her loyalty to her husband, representing the allure and disillusionment of wealth and social status.
characters.description_ko: 데이지는 닉의 사촌이자 톰의 아내로, 매혹적인 목소리와 매력으로 유명하다. 그녀는 개츠비에 대한 사랑과 남편에 대한 충성심 사이에서 갈등하며, 부와 사회적 지위의 매력과 환멸을 대변한다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Jordan Baker, a slender, small-breasted girl with an erect carriage, dressed in sporty attire, reflecting her profession as a golfer. Her grey sun-strained eyes look back with polite reciprocal curiosity out of a wan, charming, discontented face. The background features a golf course or a luxurious country club, suggesting her active and privileged lifestyle. Style: Art Deco, with clean lines, geometric shapes, and a focus on sophistication and modernity.
characters.description: Jordan is a professional golfer and friend of Daisy Buchanan, known for her cynical and self-sufficient demeanor. She represents the new woman of the Roaring Twenties, embodying independence and a detached observation of the surrounding drama.
characters.description_ko: 조던은 냉소적이고 자립적인 태도로 유명한 프로 골퍼이자 데이지 뷰캐넌의 친구이다. 그녀는 1920년대의 신여성을 대표하며, 독립성과 주변의 드라마에 대한 초연한 관찰을 구현한다.

characters.description: Myrtle is Tom Buchanan's mistress, a woman striving for a higher social status than her circumstances allow. She exhibits a vibrant, though ultimately tragic, desire for a more luxurious life.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Myrtle Wilson in her mid-thirties, faintly stout, with a strong, sensual presence. She wears a cream-colored chiffon dress, emphasizing her attempts at sophistication. Her expression is haughty and affected, with a hint of desperation in her eyes. The background features a crowded apartment, filled with overly large furniture, reflecting her aspirations and the chaotic nature of her life. Style: Realistic, with attention to detail and a focus on capturing her complex emotions.
characters.description_ko: 마틀은 톰 뷰캐넌의 정부로, 자신의 처지보다 더 높은 사회적 지위를 갈망하는 여성이다. 그녀는 더 호화로운 삶에 대한 활기차지만 결국 비극적인 욕망을 드러낸다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of George Wilson, a blond, spiritless man, anaemic and faintly handsome. He wears a dark suit covered in ashen dust, reflecting his downtrodden existence. His expression is a mix of hope and resignation, with a damp gleam in his light blue eyes. The background features a bare and unprosperous garage, with a dust-covered wreck of a Ford in the corner, symbolizing his failing business and broken dreams. Style: Gritty realism, with muted colors and a focus on capturing the weariness of his face.
characters.description: George is Myrtle's husband and the owner of a rundown garage in the valley of ashes. He is a spiritless and anaemic man, seemingly unaware of his wife's affair, and embodies the despair and hopelessness of the lower class.
characters.description_ko: 조지는 머틀의 남편이자 재의 계곡에서 허름한 정비소를 운영하는 사람이다. 그는 활기 없고 빈혈기가 있는 남자로, 아내의 불륜을 눈치채지 못한 듯하며, 하층민의 절망과 희망 없음을 구현한다.

characters.description: Catherine is Myrtle Wilson's sister, a slender and worldly girl who embodies the superficiality and gossip of the Roaring Twenties. She is known for her red hair, milky white complexion, and the constant jingling of her pottery bracelets.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Catherine, a slender, worldly girl of about thirty, with a solid, sticky bob of red hair, and a complexion powdered milky white. Her eyebrows are plucked and drawn on again at a more rakish angle. She wears numerous pottery bracelets that jingle incessantly. The background features a crowded apartment, filled with cigarette smoke and the murmur of gossip, reflecting her social life and the superficiality of her character. Style: Art Deco, with bold colors, geometric shapes, and a focus on capturing her fashionable appearance.
characters.description_ko: 캐서린은 머틀 윌슨의 여동생으로, 가냘프고 세상 물정에 밝으며 1920년대의 피상성과 뒷담화를 구현하는 인물이다. 붉은 머리, 젖빛처럼 흰 피부, 그리고 끊임없이 짤랑거리는 도자기 팔찌로 유명하다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Mr. McKee, a pale, feminine man with a white spot of lather on his cheekbone. He wears a suit and tie, attempting to appear professional. His expression is respectful and slightly obsequious, eager to please. The background features a dimly lit apartment, with photographic equipment and examples of his work, including an over-enlarged photograph of Mrs. Wilson's mother, symbolizing his artistic aspirations and his somewhat pretentious nature. Style: Soft focus, with a focus on capturing his delicate features and the artificiality of his pose.
characters.description: Mr. McKee is a pale, feminine man and an aspiring photographer who lives in the apartment below Myrtle Wilson. He is respectful and eager to impress, representing the artistic pretensions and social climbing of the era.
characters.description_ko: 미스터 맥키는 창백하고 여성적인 남자이며, 머틀 윌슨의 아래층 아파트에 사는 사진작가를 꿈꾸는 사람이다. 그는 공손하고 인상을 주기 위해 열심이며, 그 시대의 예술적 허세와 신분 상승을 대변한다.

characters.description: Owl Eyes is a stout, middle-aged man with enormous spectacles, encountered in Gatsby's library. He is initially skeptical but impressed by the authenticity of Gatsby's books, representing a superficial intellectualism and the tendency to be fooled by appearances.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Owl Eyes, a stout, middle-aged man with enormous owl-eyed spectacles perched precariously on his nose. He wears a rumpled suit and tie, suggesting a lack of attention to his appearance. His expression is a mix of drunken curiosity and intellectual pretension. The background features a towering bookshelf filled with leather-bound volumes, highlighting his fascination with knowledge and his somewhat comical appearance. Style: Caricature, with exaggerated features and a humorous tone.
characters.description_ko: 올빼미 눈은 뚱뚱한 체격의 중년 남성으로, 거대한 안경을 쓰고 있으며 개츠비의 서재에서 마주친다. 그는 처음에는 회의적이지만 개츠비 책의 진본성에 감탄하며, 피상적인 지식인주의와 겉모습에 속기 쉬운 경향을 대변한다.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Meyer Wolfshiem, a small, flat-nosed man with tiny eyes and prominent nose hair. He wears a dark suit and displays cuff buttons made of human molars, emphasizing his macabre and unsettling nature. The background features a dimly lit restaurant with a hint of the city skyline, reflecting his shadowy presence in the urban landscape. Style: Noir, with stark contrasts and a focus on capturing his unsettling demeanor.
characters.description: Wolfshiem is a gambler and a business associate of Gatsby. He is a shady character with connections to organized crime, symbolizing the corrupt underbelly of the Roaring Twenties.
characters.description_ko: Wolfshiem is a gambler and a business associate of Gatsby. He is a shady character with connections to organized crime, symbolizing the corrupt underbelly of the Roaring Twenties.

characters.description: Rosy Rosenthal is mentioned by Wolfshiem as someone who was shot outside the Metropole. His death highlights the violent and dangerous world associated with organized crime during the Prohibition era.
characters.portrait_prompt: A somber portrait of Rosy Rosenthal, a man with a worried expression, sitting at a table in the dimly lit Metropole. He wears a fedora and a dark suit. The background is blurred and indistinct, with only hints of other patrons and the street outside. Style: Noir, with a focus on shadow and a sense of impending doom.
characters.description_ko: Rosy Rosenthal is mentioned by Wolfshiem as someone who was shot outside the Metropole. His death highlights the violent and dangerous world associated with organized crime during the Prohibition era.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Ewing Klipspringer, a slightly worn young man with shell-rimmed glasses and scanty blond hair. He is dressed in a 'sport shirt,' open at the neck, sneakers, and duck trousers of a nebulous hue. His expression is embarrassed and eager to please. The background is the music room in Gatsby's mansion, with a solitary lamp illuminating the piano. Style: Realistic, with a focus on capturing his awkward demeanor and the opulence of his surroundings.
characters.description: Klipspringer is a boarder at Gatsby's mansion, known for his musical talent and willingness to entertain. He is somewhat awkward and eager to please, representing the transient and opportunistic nature of those drawn to Gatsby's wealth.
characters.description_ko: Klipspringer is a boarder at Gatsby's mansion, known for his musical talent and willingness to entertain. He is somewhat awkward and eager to please, representing the transient and opportunistic nature of those drawn to Gatsby's wealth.

characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Dan Cody, a grey, florid man with a hard, empty face, embodying the pioneer debauchee. He wears a yachting cap and a rugged coat, suggesting his adventurous life. The background features a yacht on the open sea, symbolizing his wealth and adventurous spirit. Style: Realistic, with a focus on capturing his weathered features and the harshness of his life.
characters.description: Dan Cody was a self-made millionaire who made his fortune in the Nevada silver fields and other ventures. He was Gatsby's mentor and benefactor, providing him with a life-changing opportunity.
characters.description_ko: 댄 코디는 네바다 은광과 다른 사업으로 자수성가한 백만장자였다. 그는 개츠비의 스승이자 후원자였으며, 개츠비에게 인생을 바꿀 기회를 제공했다.

characters.description: Pammy is Daisy and Tom's daughter. She appears briefly, representing a tangible, yet often overlooked, consequence of Daisy's choices and the superficiality of her world.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Pammy, a little girl with yellowy hair. She wears a simple, elegant dress, reflecting her privileged upbringing. Her expression is innocent and somewhat detached, as if she is a doll in a grand play. The background features a luxurious interior, slightly out of focus, highlighting her isolation within her parents' world. Style: Soft and dreamy, with a focus on capturing her innocence and vulnerability.
characters.description_ko: 패미는 데이지와 톰의 딸이다. 그녀는 잠시 등장하며, 데이지의 선택과 그녀의 세계의 피상성을 보여주는 실질적이지만 종종 간과되는 결과의 상징이다.

characters.description: Michaelis is a young Greek man who runs a coffee shop next to Wilson's garage. He acts as a witness to the events surrounding Myrtle's death, offering a perspective from outside the main social circles.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Michaelis, a young Greek man with a concerned expression. He wears simple work clothes, reflecting his role as a coffee shop owner. The background features his modest coffee shop, with a view of the Valley of Ashes in the distance. Style: Realistic, with a focus on capturing his earnestness and concern.
characters.description_ko: 미카엘리스는 윌슨의 정비소 옆에서 커피숍을 운영하는 젊은 그리스인이다. 그는 머틀의 죽음에 대한 사건들의 목격자 역할을 하며, 주류 사회와는 다른 관점을 제공한다.

characters.description: The Buchanans' butler is a servant in their household. He is a minor character who performs his duties and conveys messages.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of the Buchanans' butler, middle-aged and well-groomed. He wears a traditional butler's uniform with a respectful demeanor. The background is the hallway of the Buchanans' mansion, suggesting his role in maintaining the household's order. Style: Realistic, with a focus on capturing his professionalism and servitude.
characters.description_ko: 뷰캐넌 집안의 집사는 그들의 가정에서 일하는 하인이다. 그는 자신의 임무를 수행하고 메시지를 전달하는 단역 캐릭터이다.

characters.description: The chauffeur is one of Wolfshiem's proteges and works for Gatsby. He carries out instructions and is present during key events.
characters.portrait_prompt: A portrait of Gatsby's chauffeur, a burly man with a cap, standing beside one of Gatsby's luxurious cars. He has a serious expression. Style: Noir, capturing the shadowy nature of his connections.
characters.description_ko: 운전사는 울프심의 보호를 받는 사람 중 하나이며 개츠비를 위해 일한다. 그는 지시를 수행하고 주요 사건에 참여한다.
